title: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. datacard on lobbyfacts.eu
author: unknown
text:
Overview Lobbying Costs 1,250,000€ - 1,499,999€ Financial year: Jan 2024 - Dec 2024 Lobbyists (Full time equivalent) 1.1 Fte (5) Lobbyists with EP accreditation 1 High-level Commission meetings 72 Lobbying Costs over the years 
					 Info
					 The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (GS) EU Transparency Register 701266814986-18 First registered on 24 Nov 2014 Goals / Remit Goldman Sachs is a global investment banking, securities, and investment management firm that provides a wide range of financial services to a client base which includes companies as well as financial and public institutions. For more information, please refer to our website at: http://www.gs.com. Main EU files targeted Goldman Sachs participates in the EU policymaking process by engaging with relevant officials and / or members of staff from the EU institutions on specific policy issues (including but not limited to financial services, competition, and trade) and responding to selected consultations. Address Head Office 200 West Street New York, New York 10282 UNITED STATES EU Office 200 West Street New York, New York 10282 UNITED STATES Website 
					 People
					 Total lobbyists declared 5 Employment time Lobbyists 25% 4 10% 1 Lobbyists (Full time equivalent) 1.1 Lobbyists with EP accreditation All Lobbyists with EP accreditation over time 1 accreditations were / are live (in bold) for the selected state of 10 Apr 2025 Name Start date End Date Diego Zuluaga Laguna 19 Sep 2024 18 Sep 2025 Mr Martijn Vliegenthart 18 Jul 2019 18 Jul 2020 Mr Martijn Vliegenthart 15 Jun 2018 15 Jun 2019 Mr Martijn Vliegenthart 26 Apr 2017 25 Apr 2018 Mr Martijn Vliegenthart 21 Apr 2016 19 Apr 2017 Ms Jennifer COSCO 10 Nov 2015 05 Nov 2016 Complementary Information The number of persons disclosed as being involved in relevant activities and FTE is calculated on the basis of those employees whose roles entail regular interaction with officials and / or members of staff from the EU institutions. However, it should be noted that whilst such interactions may be regular, they are not necessarily frequent. Most of those employees spend less than 25 percent of their working time on activities falling within the scope of the Register. Person in charge of EU relations Data not provided by Register Secretariat due to GDPR Person with legal responsibility Data not provided by Register Secretariat due to GDPR 
					 Categories
					 Category Companies & groups 
					 Networking
					 Affiliation Goldman Sachs is a member of a number of trade associations, including but not limited to: the Association for Financial Markets in Europe (AFME), UK Finance, TheCityUK, American Chamber of Commerce EU (AmCham EU), the Futures Industry Association Europe (FIA), the International Capital Markets Association (ICMA), the International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA), the Investment Association (IA), and the International Money Market Fund Association (IMMFA). Member organisations N/A 
					 Financial Data
					 Interests represented Promotes their own interests or the collective interests of their members Closed financial year Jan 2024 - Dec 2024 Lobbying costs for closed financial year 1,250,000€ - 1,499,999€ Major contributions in closed year None declared Intermediaries for closed year Name Amount fleishman-hillard 300,000€ - 399,999€ Intermediaries for current year Name fleishman-hillard Closed year Costs 1,250,000€ - 1,499,999€ Other financial info None declared 
					 EU Structures
					 Groups (European Commission) None declared Groups (European Parliament) N/A Goldman Sachs is a member of the European Parliamentary Financial Services Forum. Communication activities None declared Other activities None declared Meetings
					 Meetings 72 meetings found. Download meetings The list below covers meetings with Commissioners/Cabinet members/Directors-general (high-level) Commission meetings published December 2014 to December 2024, and the meetings of Commissioners/Cabinet members/Directors-general and officials holding "management functions" in the Commission published since 1 January 2025. Other lobby meetings with lower-level staff may well have taken place, but the Commission doesn't proactively publish information about these meetings. All information below comes from the Commission and not from the registrant. 1 July 2024: We have noted that some meetings are appearing in duplicate, ie. some meetings seem to be listed twice. This seems to be because the Commission changes some element of a meeting data after the meeting has first been listed, which causes LobbyFacts to register it as a new meeting. We are investigating further.

excerpt: Check out all LobbyFacts data on The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. as extracted from the EU lobby transparancy register. Goldman Sachs is a global investment banking, securities, and investment management firm that provides a wide range of financial services to a client base which includes companies as well as financial and public institutions. For more information, please refer to our website at: http://www.gs.com.
